task.summary: Fixed mouseevent on canvas. added shapes to x and o player. Added turn based drawing.

Major color-selection added. Now possible to change background and grid color. Also added reset to default button, clearing the board completely and resets the colors to default (black/white). Also added a second canvas to separate the background/grid and the player canvas.
Added console visualization of the game. Added a few more checks to drawing method. Added content to Game class.
Added drawAll method to draw all existing X or O's on the board. Used when changing color on the shapes.
Put the radio buttons in a ToggleGroup, making them function as intended; one and only one active at all time.
Added all the different winner highlighting graphics.
Tweaked some drawing configuration with the diagonal winner graphics. Changed changePlayerTurn() to public and set it to onAction method call on the radio buttons.
Added game winning mechanics. Game is now in 1.0 and working properly.
Minor adjustments making sure the drawWinner method doesn't get illegal/out of bounds array position.
Added win stat tracker labels and a clear stats button.
Changed file names to existing files in relation to tic tac toe, and added new files to begin working on a connect 4 game.
Started coding on connect 4. Added 2 canvas' , 2 labels and a button. Nothing functional yet, but drawBackground method is in progress.
Added methods to compute in what square to put the figures based on set X- and Y-values.
Started writing code for the C4Game class. Made some cosmetic adjustments, and added a menu-bar.
Added a functional game launcher that lets you decide which game to play. Also improved UX for TTT ( added hand cursors to make the game more intuitive)

Added a functional game launcher that lets you decide which game to play. Also improved UX for TTT ( added hand cursors to make the game more intuitive)
